exceptions.tactic: intros v u H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u' H1 H2 H3.

original: intros v u H1 H2 H3. unfold ex_Rbar_plus in H3. destruct H1 as [l1 Hu]. destruct H2 as [l2 Hv]. rewrite Hu. rewrite Hv. simpl in H3. destruct (Rbar_plus' l1 l2) eqn:E. - rewrite E. apply Lim_seq_correct in Hu. apply Lim_seq_correct in Hv. apply is_lim_seq_plus; auto. - contradiction.
